name: gesticulation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
movements with your hands or arms intended to express something or to emphasize what you are saying: She was waving her hands in excited gesticulations. The jokes are told with so much gesticulation that the actors seem to be performing in some kind of new sign language. See
gesticulate
More examplesFewer examplesThey tried to decipher my miming and mad gesticulation.The motorist flagged me down on the highway with furious gesticulations.She expressed her anger by shouts and gesticulation.
